mapper.select: SELECT im.id, im.creator_id, im.del_flag, im.customer_name, im.region, im.business_type, im.licens_plate_number, im.parking_garage, im.make_and_model, im.status, im.inbound_date, im.clearance_team, im.pick_up_fee, im.settle_status, im.remark, su.nick_name FROM inventory_management as im left join sys_user as su on im.creator_id = su.user_id WHERE im.del_flag = 0
